**Saving Throw** DC 19 Fortitude; **Onset** 10 minutes; **Maximum Duration** 30 minutes; **Stage 1** [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=65) (10 minutes); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage and [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=91) 1 (10 minutes); **Stage 3** 1d6 poison damage, [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=63), and sickened 1 (1 minute)
